definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: A neighbor gave me a box of zucchinis and cucumbers.
sentences.chinese: 鄰居給我一箱義大利菜瓜與黃瓜。

sentences.english: MOSE is a play on the Italian name for Moses.
sentences.chinese: 摩西這個字是取自義大利人名摩西而來。

sentences.english: I really like spaghetti with meat sauce .
sentences.chinese: 我真的喜歡肉醬義大利麪。

sentences.english: The French private sector had a small surplus, as did Italy's.
sentences.chinese: 法國和義大利的私人部門也有少量盈餘。

sentences.english: Those from Italy send you their greetings.
sentences.chinese: 從義大利來的人也問你們安。

sentences.english: So what kind of Italian coffee should you order in a caffe?
sentences.chinese: 所以你要什麼樣的義大利咖啡，在外商秩序？

sentences.english: Italy isn't the only European country that has tiny 13)independent states within its 14)borders.
sentences.chinese: 義大利並非唯一在境內有迷你獨立國的歐洲國家。

sentences.english: Have an authentic Italian dinner in the North End.
sentences.chinese: 到波士頓北邊品嚐義大利道地晚餐。

sentences.english: You must really like my spaghetti because you're already having seconds.
sentences.chinese: 你一定很喜歡我煮的義大利麪，因爲你已喫第二份了。

sentences.english: I'm going to have my favorite, spaghetti with meatballs.
sentences.chinese: 我要點我最愛的義大利麪條加肉丸。

sentences.english: One day my cousin went to Italy and met a woman who was also my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 有天，表哥到義大利去並且在那認識了我的表姐。

sentences.english: It is no less difficult to learn Italian than French.
sentences.chinese: 義大利文就和法文一樣難學。

sentences.english: I will be leaving the beautiful beaches of Venice soon off to Rimini , Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我即將離開威尼斯這美麗的海灘，前往義大利裏米尼。

sentences.english: If you want to step back in time, go to Italy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想讓時光倒流，到義大利一遊吧。

sentences.english: In an art gallery in Florence, Italy.
sentences.chinese: 在義大利佛羅倫斯的一所畫廊裏。

sentences.english: Did you ever have pizzas before?
sentences.chinese: 你從前喫過義大利餡餅？

definition: United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
